scripts.docker:uph3: bun scripts/write-public-ip-env.mjs && docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.h3.yml up
scripts.docker:dev: bun scripts/write-public-ip-env.mjs && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev-web.yml up --build
